data.prayer: Father, help media producers communicate the gospel in a way that is understandable to the people of Morelos, Mexico.
data.verse: But from there, you will seek the LORD your God, and you will find Him if you search for Him with all your heart and all your soul.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Morelos, Mexico
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, please make every disciple be a disciple maker, every home a training center, and every church a church planting movement in the state of Morelos.
Spirit, give the believers of the the state of Morelos unity and humility as they work to bring the kingdom to new people and places.
Jesus, raise up prophets and truth speakers in your church in Morelos, Mexico so that the church can grow in every way into the mature body of you its head.
data.verse: Instead, speaking the truth in love, we will grow to become in every respect the mature body of him who is the head, that is, Christ.

data.prayer: Lord, remember the Jew, Spanish-speaking people. Make the Jew, Spanish-speaking people a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for your own possession.
Father, let those from the 176,068 believers who are shaken and weak remember that your love will never fail them.
data.verse: Love never fails. But where there are prophecies, they will be done away with. Where there are various languages, they will cease. Where there is knowledge, it will be done away with.

data.prayer: Father, convict the 176,068 believers in Morelos to be holy and righteous. Inspire them to gather in small groups for accountability and spiritual growth.
Spirit, encourage the disciples in Morelos, Mexico to live with urgency and a passion for making more disciples.
data.verse: Yet you do not know what your life will be like tomorrow. you are just a vapor that appears for a little while and then vanishes away.
